titleStmt.title: A iustification or cleering of the Prince of Orendge agaynst the false sclaunders, wherewith his ilwillers goe about to charge him wrongfully. Translated out of French by Arthur Goldyng

Justification or cleering of the Prince of Orendge agaynst the false sclaunders, wherewith his ilwillers goe about to charge him wrongfully.
titleStmt.author: Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Day, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate. Febr. 24. These bookes are to be sold at his long shop at the west doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: The first two leaves are blank.
Variant: title page lacks the line "Translated .. Goldyng.".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
